values.name: HASH_160
values.comments: Input is hashed twice: first with [SHA-256](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-2) and then with [RIPEMD-160](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RIPEMD) (bitcoin's OP_HASH160).

values.name: HASH_256
values.comments: Input is hashed twice with [SHA-256](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-2) (bitcoin's OP_HASH256).
